item.name: Peter Seppelt
item.address1: Grand Cru Estate, Dewells Road, Springton, SA 5235
item.description: Peter and Roz Seppelt have taken over the grandly titled Grand Cru Estate established by Karl Seppelt. The 9ha vineyard is planted to chardonnay, riesling, pinot noir, cabernet sauvignon and merlot. Only part of the grapes produced from the now fully mature vineyard are used for the production of the Peter Seppelt brand, the remainder to willing buyers. Exports to China.
